{\bf \section*{I.Report of the Scheduled changes : }}

{\bf \begin{itemize}
\item Changes between 1.X and 2.X are resumed \doxyref{api\_\-change}{p.}{api_change}\end{itemize}
}

{\bf \section*{II. How to compile locally}}

{\bf \begin{itemize}
\item Compile :\begin{itemize}
\item follow tutorial to have an etics installation and a gfal build on your pc\item Install scons ( \tt{http://www.scons.org,} python script )\item \char`\"{} git svn clone  http://svnweb.cern.ch/guest/lcgutil/gfal/branches/gfal\_\-2\_\-0\_\-main gfal2 \char`\"{}\item \char`\"{} cd gfal2 \char`\"{}\item \char`\"{}scons -j 8\char`\"{}\end{itemize}
\item Compile tests :\begin{itemize}
\item Install python $>$=2.4\item Install scons\item execute \char`\"{}scons test\char`\"{} in the CERNgfal dir\end{itemize}
\item Clean builds :\begin{itemize}
\item scons -c \end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
}
